thread.title: Watch: GFRIEND Shares Choreography Version Of “Fingertip” MV
thread.title_full: Watch: GFRIEND Shares Choreography Version Of “Fingertip” MV

author: ilmare42
title: Watch: GFRIEND Shares Choreography Version Of “Fingertip” MV
text:
GFRIEND shows off all their choreography for “Fingertip” in a new video! 
On March 9 at midnight KST, the group released a choreography version of their hit “Fingertip” MV, in which the members give fans a look at their full dance for the track while they perform in their military-inspired outfits on a rooftop. Check out the new version below! 
GFRIEND’s “Fingertip” is the title track off their fourth mini album “The Awakening,” which was released on March 6 . The group will be performing the track for the first time on a music show on Mnet’s “M!Countdown” on March 9. 
Do you love GFRIEND’s choreography for “Fingertip”?
